title: By the King, a proclamation prohibiting dirt-boats and bum-boats upon the river of Thames
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the sixth day of April, in the twenty third year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
